title: Looking at the brain with a geologist's “eye” (EPFL - École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne) ...
text: ( Source : EPFL - École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne ) 14.10.15- Using a geologist's imaging tool, researchers have made unprecedented high-resolution images of how carbon atoms from glucose are integrated into brain cells, providing new
